```{r load-packages}

library(ggplot2)
library(GGally)
library(HSAUR2)
library(MVA)
library(aplpack)

```

```{r ch1-5-1-ggpairs}
data("USairpollution")
ggpairs(USairpollution,
        lower = list(continuous = wrap("smooth", alpha = 0.3)),
        diag = list(discrete="barDiag", 
                    continuous = wrap("densityDiag", alpha = 0.5 )))
str(USairpollution)

```

```{r ch1-5-1-stars}

stars(USairpollution)

```

```{r ch1-5-2-facess}

faces(USairpollution, face.type = 1)


```

```{r ch1-5-2}
x <- USairpollution[,c("temp", "wind")]
bvbox(x, xlab = "temp", ylab = "wind")
title(main = "Bivariate boxplot for USairpollution")
identify(x)
```

```{r ch1-5-3}
plot(popul ~ manu, data = USairpollution, pch = 9)
with(USairpollution, symbols(manu, popul, circles = SO2, 
                             inches = 0.5, add = TRUE))
title(main = "Bubble plot for USairpollution")

summary(lm(SO2 ~ manu+popul, data = USairpollution))
```
